name: hon
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
short form of honey: a way of speaking to someone you like or love, or someone who you want to be friendly to: So, hon, how'd your day go? Thanks, hon, but I'd rather relax and watch some TV.
More examplesFewer examplesAppreciate it, hon, thanks.Hon, this isn't a swimsuit competition. That's great - thanks hon.

abbreviation for
Honourable UK , when used as a title: The report was written by a recently appointed judge, the Hon. Mr Justice Carlton.
UK abbreviation for
honorary , when used as part of a title: the Hon. Treasurer
